column5: Freezing rain really bad here in Fort Erie.  I had to cancel my trip up to Peterborough today and I hope some of you do the same.  The roads are gonna get worse and its not worth the risk!  Please Drive Safe today and tomorrow!

Schools are all closed here, roads aren`t too bad though, they started salting them yesterday. Pictures on the news show things much worse west of here in Indiana, haven`t caught how much more to come.

Started snowing  here in Toronto about 5:00 this morning Charlie and is coming down very heavy right now, sposed to get around 10" before it's done.  I've got nowhere to go  today and that's a good thing
Don't forget to cover your Banana trees Lew!  I hope everyone up there makes it through this storm with no difficulties.
Nothing has started here in Ottawa other than a strong East wind ~ 35km/h....school buses are not running in anticipation of the forecasted heavy snow we're supposed to get.
Snowing heavy here, schools closed etc. Freezing rain and ice pellets called for later.  To those who must venture out, please drive safe everyone
I hear there is snow in TO I guess the troops are preparing to  move in and help
These Canadian grown bananas are pretty tough Dawg, they'll do OK
The've already started moving us into bomb shelters...
